text: Excellent church with amazing people. I have been going for 19 years and will never go anywhere else. The pastor and family are great people. We have an excellent youth program and college and career group.

text: Injoyed Gods presence during worship  the word of God preached .was  great .everyone  is friendly and make you feel welcome

name: ms. S
text: Visited this church for a conference and had a blast! Great music, friendly church members, and the church was beautiful! If you're local, please do yourself a favor and visit.

name: hi hi
text: This is an amazing church. It is a one of a kind church. I have been to many churches and none of them gave me the experience I have had at this church. You can just feel God standing in that place.The pastor is very kind and he teaches from scripture. I am just so thankful that God let me come to this church with his people.

name: David Moultry
text: Without fear of contradiction it’s a place you are certain to find God. A place where a moving of the spirit happens regularly. Bishop Sutton is the real deal! Granted there’s no good in any of us (thus said the word of God) however he’s truly a man of God that lives, eats and breathe the gospel of Christ. His vision has become the launching pad to hope, love, peace, the truth, and family life the way God intended it to be. Newlife has been nothing short of a blessing to me. The preaching, teaching and culture exemplifies the meaning “NEW LIFE”. If you’re looking for a church home search no longer, for this is the place! Come consumed with expectations and who knows what might happen. It’s a powerful ministry!

name: Elier Avalos
text: As someone who has been in and out of church, I can’t tell you the times that I have been greeted by love and smiles each time that I come back. It is so hard to find a pastor who actually lives by the biblical ideals as the pastor from New Life. It keeps me coming back for more and furthermore, they are not afraid of preaching truth. Thank God for New Life church as well as the leadership ❤️🙏🏼

name: Chelsea Green
text: I felt very pressured to speak in tongues. Alot of judgemental people. If you dont follow their "rules" they blacklist you. More obsessed with man made religion than God Himself.

name: Tristan Hood
text:
I absolutely love this church! The preaching and teaching is the best I’ve experienced in the 30 years I’ve been attending church. The people are warm, inviting, thoughtful, funny, and full of the Holy Ghost. I’ve never gone and not experienced an excellent move of the Spirit.

I’ve worked with the people of New Life and they are top notch. The Praise and Worship is the best I’ve experienced and it’s largely because they put the emphasis on worship. The pastor consistently prays for the praise team during the worship service, the flow is phenomenal and they have the process down to an art. The exhortation is powerful and, again, the preaching is thought provoking and filling.

I’m proud to have experienced 7 years of my spiritual journey at New Life and count it an honor to call its people my friends.

name: E.T. Hollander
text: A Great church that spreads the true word of God. Super people with a love for God and and his people.

name: Chloeey Jackson
text: Will never go back was there from 5 to 17, they do not care about outsiders and most of them are stuck up if you don’t live like they do,I know because I was one of them. It’s a horrible place if I didn’t leave I would have died I was so depressed and no one would take the time and talk to me.

name: Cynthia Hagadorn
text: I love this place and the people.  New life  has a special place in my heart. I call it home. My friends & family welcome you.

name: Gregory Hall
text: I was not thrilled when visiting this church. Parishioners were very pushy to visitors. Ministers were quite over bearing. Everyone was just too overwhelming and I simply could not just attend church and try and experience, learn something, or enjoy it myself. Someone said to me they were a “multicultural “ church. I’m not sure what was meant by multicultural as it was overwhelming white southern evangelical culture there and not much more. I just simply do not recommend. 👎

name: Bert Pierce
text: This is an incredibly spiritual atmosphere of active praise and worship!  Awesome messages to this multicultural church body are sure to expand your understanding of the Bible and God's will in your life!

name: Roy ORR
text: My boys loved going to preschool there. Many thanks and blessings to the staff and especially Mrs. Kandi. ❤️

name: Sabrina Mckinney
text: The title speaks for itself. New Life. Look no further, This church has EVERYTHING that you need. They teach the 100% TRUTH and nothing but the TRUTH. If you're confused, hungry, thirsty, or lost, this is the missing piece to the puzzle. 1,000 star Rating!

name: Brooke Tisdale
text: The most amazing, revival centered church you could be apart of! The pastor is wonderful, as well as the church family. I'm so glad I've been apart of this church for many years now, and will be apart of it for many more to come! Highly recommend coming to New Life and experiencing the presence of God!

name: Tynese Tippins
text: I love this Church! The man of God here truly lives what he preaches. When you can look around and see the diversity and feel the love; the leadership must be doing something right.

name: maria smith
text: Great Place of worship. Amazing place to grow in Christ. Amazing diverse family of Christ. The fist day you will experience the presence of God.  Kids love it too!!

name: Tina Pierce
text: This is a wonderfuly multicultural church of sincere and loving people!  I thank God for New Life!!!

name: J Simmons
text: Wonderful, diversity community of people, believing in the God head - God, Jesus and the Holy Ghost. Scripture based, worship oriented and a family sense are all a part of this church. As a newcommer we were  affectionately welcomed and included, as if we had been a part of this body for years. Believe and receive here, for a visit or for life.

name: Patience Oneil
text: It is very rare to find a church that teaches the whole truth in Birmingham. The presence of God is overwhelming in every single service. Powerful preaching, annointed music, miracles, signs, wonders, love and family are a few things you will find at New Life.

name: Jim Corey
text: Awesome worship!

name: Dane Stipes
text: Definitely a church that I could never imagine leaving! The people are genuine, the pastor is beyond phenomenal, and God moves in every single service! If you're looking for a real and fervent move of God then this church is definitely a place you would love to call home!

name: TM
text: Absolutely amazing and welcoming church family. The preaching is 100% Biblical and the worship and atmosphere are phenomenal and God centered.

name: Sam Iam
text: A place where Truth, is taught, and you are encouraged to see it for yourself in the word of God. The Pastor tells you what you need to know to be saved, and sometimes it's not what your flesh wants to hear. Everything is they do is backed up by the word of God.

name: Ollie Gunn
text: Great place and wonderful atmosphere!!

name: Amber Corey
text: Absolutely love this church! Life changing services, great pastor, friendly people, awesome worship, God moves in every service. Come and you will be blessed...guaranteed!

text: True example of what THE WORD OF God teaches....Great Church, Great People, Great Worship, Great Preaching.....Great Pastor! Best in Birmingham area!

text: Amazing church and every one treats you like family and we all love each other even if its your first time.

Doing everything we can to feed our community.

They were so helpful, talked with me, prayed with me, and the prayers were ANSWERED! THANK YOU TO THIS CHURCH!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your wonderful comments! And we are grateful to The Lord for answering your prayer. That’s a blessing to know. Thanks again and have a God blessed day.

text: Awesome.  This is a great place to go to church.  Me and my family have always loved going here.  We live quit a distance from this church, but every once and a while we will visit with these kind people.  The singing is great and the preaching is great.  After you leave, you really feel like you've been to church!!!!!!!

name: Rose Osborne
text: I absolutely love this church nothing but family here brothers and sisters in christ. This has became my home church. I encourage anyone looking for a church this would be the one to visit. The presence of god is here. Great fellowship and worship. I love my church family.

resp.text: Thank you Teresa for giving our church 5 stars! Harvest Church is a wonderful place to worship and hear from The Lord. To Jesus be the glory!

text: Nice church

resp.text: Hi Mr. Bryant, thank you for your review for Harvest Church. Please continue being a part of our church family at Harvest. Contact us directly if we can assist in anyway. Would you consider giving us a 5 star review? We strive to keep a high rating.

text: Fantastic Pastor, awesome music and singing, great people, friends and family. And the best part of all, it’s a one God Apostolic Pentecostal church.

If you looking to feel welcome no matter what you look like, this is it.. such a blessed church! We will be back for sure!!! This church blessed my soul!!! 💕🙏🏻

resp.text: Renee, thank you for the kind words!  We are so glad you came and look forward to seeing what God is going to continue to do in your life!

text: People in our church have always shown love to me and my family. The adults love creating fun activities all thru the year that the kids like to do. We're all kids of different ages.

text: I was treated as family, very welcomed into their Church. I will most likely go back for another event. 👏👏🙏🙏😄

text: beautiful church i myself, am a devoted member of that church! they reason the church is call central assembly because there are multiple languages  spoken there. they have Spanish, English, and Marseilles

text:
My home Church
All welcome! Loving friendly church family

name: Robert Slack
text: Nice family friendly​ place to worship

name: Stephanie Hollinger
text: Oh how I love this church!!!! When I first started going, everyone was very welcoming and was sensitive about my feelings and was not pushy at all. They welcome all guests warmly and with a gift for all. No one is pushed to give offerings or tithes and I have been going every since. I love everyone at those church and I love meeting new people that come to our building and join us all for Sunday school at 9:00am, praise and worship at 10:00am, bible studies on Wednesday nights at 7:00pm, prayer on Sunday at 8:30am Wednesday at 6:30pm and Saturday afternoon at 2:00pm. I enjoy seeing new people of the church. If you are looking for. Church Home, please visit us when you can. We love you all!!!!

name: Matt C
text: For me this church is home. The experiences I’ve had at this church will forever have an impact on my life.

name: Linda Martin
text: Great church, friendly, great people that truly love the Lord

name: Tina Roehm
text: Love my church and my church family. I cant wait to come back to my church family.

name: Linda Martin
text: Wonderful church family... exciting place to be. The people are so loving and friendly. Check this one out if you need a church in Greenville, AL.

name: Jan Moreno
text: Wonderful  worship, PRAISE, alive and anointing preaching.

name: Coy Flenory
text: The teaching is awesome and the friendliness and the atmosphere is exceptional I love my Pastors! !! Pastors Ken and Donna are phenomenal.

name: Antha Cody
text: I love my church and am so blessed to be able to say that I've been here with Pastor Ken Jackson since God called him to Eufaula. Pastor Ken and Donna are wonderful and have made a difference in my life, my family and this community. CLC, a great place to be!

text: This church is so awesome. Friendly Pastor and the members are so welcoming! What a mighty move of the Lord. You can feel his presence when you walk through the doors.

text: The perfect church for anyone wanting to grow in God! Christ-centered, family friendly, and individually focused. The pastor and supporting leadership encourage a sincere move of God in every service. Love my New Life family!
